name: WP Social Invites
author: Manish Bhojwani

sections.description:
WP Social Invites allow your visitors to invite their social network friends directly into your WordPress site. This plugin has no conflict with any Plugin.

Demo link:
http://webtanner.com/projects/demos/wp-social-invites/

Key Feature:

  • Send invitation personally in form of personalized text.
  • Page and Popup supportive.
  • Supports widgets.
  • Supports shortcode.
  • Default slider layout.
  • Responsive popups.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-social-invites directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the WP Social Invites plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the EMP Slider screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Dont have any FAQ for now.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-social-invites directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the WP Social Invites plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the EMP Slider screen to configure the plugin.

short_description: WP Social Invites allows your visitors to invite their social friends on your website.
